sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>clear the default value for status field  in sys highlighted condition table.</description>
        <name>clear default value from highlighted</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateDefaultValue('sys_highlighted_value_condition', 'status', '');
function updateDefaultValue(table, columnName, defaultValue) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', table);
	gr.addQuery('element', columnName);
	gr.query();
	if(gr.next() && gr.getValue('default_value') !== defaultValue){
		gr.setValue('default_value',defaultValue);
		gr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-09-24 15:56:29</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9719e161733230103c066a0c4cf6a750</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>clear default value from highlighted</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agent Workspace - Highlighted Values" source="com.snc.agent_workspace.highlighted_values">43fa7c203c35311068bcf327dfe37f61</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9719e161733230103c066a0c4cf6a750</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-09-24 15:56:29</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
